9. hospitableness - quality of being welcoming to guests
10. humanization - the act of making something human or humane
11. slouchy - having a relaxed, drooping posture
12. mudslinging - the act of making derogatory statements about others
13. moviemaker - someone who makes movies
14. lightheadedness - feeling dizzy or faint
15. inexpensiveness - the quality of being low in cost
16. hydroplane - a vehicle that moves across water

From this list, "limitlessness" is by far the closest association with "infinite" - it's essentially a synonym. Limitlessness means having no bounds or limits, which is exactly what infinite means.
